title: LCM Calculator
statement:
# LCM Calculator

Compute the Least Common Multiple of two numbers.

## Problem Description

The LCM of two integers is the smallest positive integer divisible by both. Use the formula: LCM(a,b) = |a×b| / GCD(a,b)

## Input Format

Two space-separated positive integers A and B.

## Output Format

The LCM of A and B.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ A, B ≤ 10^6
- Result fits in 64-bit integer
